title: WTF with that new VOICEOVER!!!????
body: Really, i mean really -its so so irritating, that ill stop play this game. BRING BACK old voiceover....

replies.body: How are you people this ignorant?

that's the Dark Star Thresh announcer....

are you really that ignorant?
are you retarded? Its thresh and only for a limited time? Does nobody pay attention to what Riot announces? Like at all? You literally came on the boards where the answer literally lies.
Yeah it's disgusting. What the fuck? Am I playing an 80's racing game in the arcade or something?
I don't care if it's temporary, or even if they announced it. It sucks and I want the old voice back.
